item.name: &c&lPhoenix Feather&r &7(1 use)
lore: &7An attack that would normally kill you
&7will heal you to full HP instead, and this
&7item will be automatically destroyed as a result.
&7This trinket will only attempt to activate
&7if your Phoenix is on cooldown, or if you
&7do not have the Phoenix enchantment equipped.
